7M7.F.summary: Maha Energy AB (publ), an independent and international oil and gas company, engages in the exploration, development, and production of crude oil and natural gas in the United States, Brazil, and Sweden. The company owns a 75% working interest in the Tartaruga Block that covers 13,201 acres located in the Sergipe Alagoas Basin of Brazil; 99% interest in LAK Ranch heavy oil field, which covers 6,475 acres situated on the eastern edge of the prolific Powder River Basin in Wyoming, the United States; and 100% working interests in six onshore concession agreements, including the oil producing Tie field covering an area of 41,606 acres located in the Reconcavo Basin of Brazil. As of December 31, 2019, it had proven and probable reserves of 39.750 million barrels of oil. The company was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

CWE.F.summary: Crown Energy AB (publ), together with its subsidiaries, operates as an international oil, gas, and property industries with operations focused on underexplored areas in Africa and the Middle East. It operates through two segments, Asset Development and Management Business Area, and Energy Business Area. The Asset Development and Management Business Area segment provides customized residential and office solutions, and associated services to energy companies. Its services include design and construction, leasing, and property management, as well as other value-added services, such as security, transport, and telecommunications. The Energy Business Area segment develops and explores oil assets in early stages for recoverable reserves. Crown Energy AB (publ) was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden. Crown Energy AB (publ) is a subsidiary of YBE Ventures Ltd.

LNDNF.summary: Lundin Energy AB (publ), an independent oil and gas company, engages in the exploration, development, and production of oil and gas properties primarily in Norway. As of December 31, 2020, it had proved plus probable net reserves of 671 million barrels of oil equivalent (MMboe); and proved plus probable plus possible net reserves of 826 MMboe. The company was formerly known as Lundin Petroleum AB (publ) and changed its name to Lundin Energy AB (publ) in March 2020. Lundin Energy AB (publ) was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

MISE.ST.summary: Misen Energy AB (publ) operates as an upstream oil and gas company in Ukraine. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

SI8.F.summary: Misen Energy AB (publ) operates as an upstream oil and gas company in Ukraine. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Gothenburg, Sweden.

TETY.ST.summary: Tethys Oil AB (publ) focuses on the exploration and production of oil and natural gas properties. It holds 50% interests in the Block 49 covering approximately 15,439 square kilometers; 30% interest in the Blocks 3&4, which has net working interest of 26,922 thousand barrels of oil (mbo) of proven and probable reserves and 2C contingent resources of 13,904 mbo covering approximately 29,130 square kilometers; 65% interest in the Block 56 covering approximately 5,808 square kilometers located in the southeastern part of the Sultanate of Oman; and 100% interest in the Block 58 covering approximately 4,557 square kilometers located in the Dhofar Governorate in the southern part of the Sultanate of Oman. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.
